          <title>
            <string language="hu">Csatahajó keresztmetszete</string>
            <string language="en">Battle Ship's Cross Section</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Querschnitt Des Schlacht-Schiffs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Coupe du Bateau de Bataille</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Seção Transversal Do Navio Da Batalha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sezione Trasversale Della Nave Di Battaglia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαγώνιο τμήμα του σκάφους μάχης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sección transversal De la Nave De la Batalla</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Csatahajó keresztmetszetének bemutatása</string>
            <string language="en">Introduction of Battle Ship's Cross Section</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">támadások,  csatahajó,  hajóbelső,  </string>
            <string language="en">attacks, battleship, interior of the ship,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einleitung des Querschnitts des Schlacht-Schiffs</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Introduction de la coupe du bateau de bataille</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Introdução da seção transversal do navio da 
batalha</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Introduzione della sezione trasversale della nave 
di battaglia</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εισαγωγή του διαγώνιου τμήματος του σκάφους μάχης</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Introducción de la sección transversal de la 
nave de la batalla</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Angriffe, Linienschiff, Innere des Schiffs,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">attaques, cuirassé, intérieur du bateau,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ataques, cruzador de batalha, interior do navio,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">attacchi, battleship, interiore della nave,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επιθέσεις, θωρηκτό, εσωτερικό του σκάφους,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ataques, acorazado, interior de la nave,</string>
          </keyword>
